scripts.dev: node scripts/prepare-schema.js && node scripts/clean-prisma.js && node scripts/clean-next.js && prisma generate && next dev
scripts.build: node scripts/prepare-schema.js && node scripts/clean-prisma.js && prisma generate && prisma migrate deploy && next build
scripts.postinstall: node scripts/prepare-schema.js && node scripts/clean-prisma.js && prisma generate
scripts.db:push: node scripts/prepare-schema.js && node scripts/clean-prisma.js && prisma generate && prisma db push
scripts.db:migrate: node scripts/prepare-schema.js && node scripts/clean-prisma.js && prisma generate && prisma migrate dev
